snippet: Revealing new light has been cast on some American cultural figures now that the Ford Foundation has given decades’ worth of its documents to the Rockefeller Archive Center.
abstract: Ford Foundation makes available an archive of thousands of decades-old records, films, oral histories and internal reports to researchers at the Rockefeller Archive Center in Sleepy Hollow, NY; documents, which highlight how the organization awarded grants, could yield a harvest of insights on past cultural figures.
lead_paragraph: Revealing new light has been cast on some American cultural figures now that the Ford Foundation has given decades’ worth of its documents to the Rockefeller Archive Center.

headline.seo: Ford Foundation Records Move to Rockefeller Archive Center
headline.main: Foundation Files Reveal Insights on Culture
headline.print_headline: Foundation Files Reveal Insights On Culture
